abstract: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway earned a $1 billion paper profit from an investment it agreed to make in Chinese hybrid carmaker BYD less than a year ago.
snippet: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway earned a $1 billion paper profit from an investment it agreed to make in Chinese hybrid carmaker BYD less than a year ago.
lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway earned a $1 billion paper profit from an investment it agreed to make in Chinese hybrid carmaker BYD less than a year ago, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Buffett Gains $1 Billion on China Carmaker
